keys: Lombardic art, goldsmith's art, Lombardic iron crown, 6th century

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d170b4-cd60-4310-21da-6c3c0805037f#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Lombard vaskorona, 6.század, rekeszzománcos aranylemez.</string>
            <string language="en">Lombardic iron crown, 6th century, gold lief with cloisoné enamel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lombardic Eisenkrone, 6. Jahrhundert, Goldlief mit
cloisoné Emaille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couronne de fer de Lombardic, 6ème siècle, lief
d'or avec l'émail de cloisoné</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa do ferro de Lombardic, õ século, lief do 
ouro com esmalte do cloisoné</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore del ferro di Lombardic, sesto 
secolo, lief dell'oro con lo smalto del cloisoné</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κορώνα σιδήρου Lombardic, 6ος αιώνας, χρυσός 
lief με το σμάλτο cloisonι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona del hierro de Lombardic, 6to siglo, lief 
del oro con el esmalte del cloisoné</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">lombard vaskorona, melynek belső pántját a legenda szerint Krisztus t átszúró egyik vasszög tartja.</string>
            <string language="en">Lombardic iron crown, whose internal band is held by one of the Christ stabbing iron nail as the legend has it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">langobárd művészet,  ötvösség,  lombard vaskorona,  6.század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Lombardic art, goldsmith's art, Lombardic iron crown, 6th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lombardic Eisenkrone, deren internes Band durch 
eins des Christ erstechenden Eisennagels angehalten wird, da die 
Legende ihn hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couronne de fer de Lombardic, dont la bande 
interne est tenue par une de l'ongle poignardant de fer du Christ car 
la légende l'a.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa do ferro de Lombardic, cuja a faixa interna 
é mantida por um do prego stabbing do ferro de Christ porque a 
legenda o tem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore del ferro di Lombardic, di cui la
fascia interna è tenuta da una del chiodo stabbing del ferro del 
Christ poichè la leggenda lo ha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κορώνα σιδήρου Lombardic, η της οποίας εσωτερική 
ζώνη ένα από το διαπερνώντας καρφί σιδήρου Χριστού ως μύθος το
έχει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona del hierro de Lombardic, que venda interna 
es sostenida por una del clavo del hierro de Cristo que apuñala pues 
la leyenda lo tiene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lombardic kunst, kunst des Goldschmieds, Lombardic Eisenkrone, 
6. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art de Lombardic, l'art de l'orfèvre, couronne de fer de 
Lombardic, 6ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte de Lombardic, arte do goldsmith, coroa do ferro de 
Lombardic, õ século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte di Lombardic, arte dell'orafo, parte superiore del ferro di
Lombardic, sesto secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη Lombardic, τέχνη του χρυσοχόου, κορώνα σιδήρου 
Lombardic, 6ος αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte de Lombardic, arte del orfebre, corona del hierro de 
Lombardic, 6to siglo</string>
          </keyword>
